fields.desc: The devil magically turns invisible  along with any equipment it carries. This invisibility ends if the devil makes an attack  falls unconscious  or dismisses the effect.

fields.name: Sting
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, becoming poisoned for 1 minute on a failure. The target can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

fields.name: Breath Weapons
fields.desc: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

fields.name: Molten Breath
fields.desc: The dragon exhales molten glass in a 20-foot-long  5-foot-wide line. Each creature in the area makes a DC 11 saving throw  taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

fields.name: Sleep Breath
fields.desc: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  a creature falls unconscious for 10 minutes or until it takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage.

fields.name: Breath Weapons
fields.desc: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

fields.name: Lightning Breath
fields.desc: The dragon exhales lightning in a 30-foot-long  5-foot-wide line. Each creature in the area makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw  taking 16 (3d10) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

fields.name: Ocean Surge
fields.desc: The dragon exhales a torrent of seawater in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be pushed 15 feet away from the dragon.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6+4) piercing damage.

fields.name: Claws
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4+4) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature  it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends  the bear can't attack a different target with its claws.

fields.name: Javelin
fields.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage  or 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage if the target is a creature that is surprised or that can't see the bugbear.

fields.name: Maul
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage  or 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage if the target is a creature that is surprised or that can't see the bugbear.

fields.name: Move Out
fields.desc: The bugbear and creatures of its choice within 30 feet move up to half their Speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The bugbear chief makes two attacks.

fields.name: Javelin
fields.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage  or 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage if the target is a creature that is surprised or that can't see the bugbear.

fields.name: Maul
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Stealthy Sneak
fields.desc: The bugbear moves up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. It can then attempt to hide.

fields.name: Strangle
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one Medium or smaller creature that is surprised  grappled by the bugbear  or that can't see the bugbear. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage  and the target is pulled 5 feet towards the bugbear and grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends  the bugbear automatically hits with the Strangle attack and the target can't breathe.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 30 (4d12 + 4) piercing damage.

fields.name: Burrow
fields.desc: The bulette burrows under the ground without provoking opportunity attacks  moves up to its burrow speed  and then resurfaces in an unoccupied space. If it is within 5 feet of a creature  it then makes a bite attack.

fields.name: Hard Carapace
fields.desc: After taking damage from an attack, the bulette lies down and closes its eyes, protecting all vulnerable spots. Until the beginning of its next turn, its AC becomes 21 and it has advantage on saving throws.

fields.name: Jaw Clamp
fields.desc: When an attacker within 5 feet of the bulette misses it with a melee attack, the bulette makes a bite attack against the attacker. On a hit, the attacker is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the grappled creature is restrained, and the only attack the bulette can make is a bite against the grappled creature.

fields.name: Leap
fields.desc: The bulette leaps up to half its Speed horizontally and half its Speed vertically without provoking opportunity attacks  and can land in a space containing one or more creatures. Each creature in its space when it lands makes a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw  taking 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage and being knocked prone on a failure. On a success  the creature takes half damage and is pushed 5 feet to a space of its choice. If that space is occupied  the creature is knocked prone.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (2d12+6) piercing damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends  the target is restrained  and the bunyip can't bite another target.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The bunyip makes a bite attack and two slam attacks.

fields.name: Slam
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d10+6) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Terrifying Howl
fields.desc: The bunyip unleashes a terrifying howl. Each creature of its choice within 120 feet that can see and hear it makes a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw, becoming frightened for 1 minute on a failure. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creatures saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the bunyips Terrifying Howl for the next 24 hours.

fields.name: Black Iron Blade
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage  and the target takes a wound that deals 5 (1d10) ongoing slashing damage. A creature can end the ongoing damage by staunching the wound as an action or by giving the target magical healing.

fields.name: Command
fields.desc: The cambion gives an order to an ally within 60 feet that can hear it. If the ally has a reaction available, it can use it to follow the cambions order, either taking an action or moving up to its Speed.

fields.name: Fell Charm
fields.desc: The cambion targets one creature within 30 feet. The target makes a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it is magically charmed by the cambion for 1 day. The effect ends if the cambion or a cambions ally harms the target, or if the cambion commands it to take a suicidal action. While charmed, the target regards the cambion as a trusted friend and is an ally of the cambion. If the target makes a successful saving throw or the effect ends, the target is immune to this cambions Fell Charm for 24 hours.

fields.name: Fiery Escape
fields.desc: The cambion magically creates a fiery portal to the realm of its fiendish parent. The portal appears in an empty space within 5 feet. The portal lasts until the end of the cambions next turn or until it passes through the portal. No one but the cambion can pass through the portal; anyone else that enters its space takes 14 (4d6) fire damage.

fields.name: Fire Blast
fields.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (3d8) fire damage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The cambion makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

fields.name: Shapeshift
fields.desc: The cambion magically changes its form to that of any humanoid creature it has seen before, or back into its true form. While shapeshifted, its statistics are unchanged except that it has no armor or equipment, can't use its black iron blade, and can fly only if it is in a form with wings. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Claws
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage. If this damage would reduce a Small or larger target to 0 hit points  the target takes no damage from this attack.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8+5) piercing damage.

fields.name: Claws
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4+5) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature  it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends  the bear can't attack a different target with its claws.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The bear makes two melee attacks.

fields.name: Greatclub
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage  and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature  it makes a DC 14 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

fields.name: Javelin
fields.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

fields.name: Sweeping Strike
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft.  all creatures within 5 feet. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage  and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature  it makes a DC 14 Strength saving throw. On a failure  it is pushed 10 feet away from the ogre.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

fields.name: Claw
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The troll attacks with its bite and twice with its claw. When the troll uses Multiattack  it can make a rock attack in place of one claw attack.

fields.name: Rock
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Deadeye Shot
fields.desc: The centaur makes a shortbow attack with advantage.

fields.name: Hooves
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If this attack deals damage  the centaurs movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks from the target for the rest of the centaurs turn.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The centaur attacks with its pike and its hooves.

fields.name: Pike
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

fields.name: Shortbow
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

fields.name: Animate Chain
fields.desc: One inanimate, unattended chain within 60 feet sprouts blades and magically animates under the devils control for 1 hour. It has AC 20 and 20 hit points, a Speed of 0, and immunity to psychic, piercing, poison, and thunder damage. When the devil uses Multiattack, the devil may command the chain to make one Chain attack against a target within 15 feet of it. If the chain is reduced to 0 hit points, it can't be reanimated.

fields.name: Chain
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature  it is grappled (escape DC 16) and restrained. Until the grapple ends  this chain can only attack the grappled target.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The chain devil makes two chain attacks and commands up to two animated chains under its control to make chain attacks.

fields.name: Unnerving Mask
fields.desc: When damaged by a creature within 30 feet that can see the devil, the devil momentarily assumes the magical illusory form of one of the attackers enemies or loved ones, alive or dead. The illusory figure may speak words that only the attacker can hear. The attacker makes a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it takes 9 (2d8) psychic damage and is frightened until the end of its next turn.The attacker is then immune to this effect for the next 24 hours.

fields.name: Greataxe
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage. If the warrior has moved this turn, this attack is made with advantage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The warrior attacks twice.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: The chimera uses its Bite attack.

fields.name: Breath Weapon
fields.desc: The dragon head breathes fire in a 15-foot cone. Creatures in the area make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw  taking 21 (6d6) fire damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

fields.name: Claw
fields.desc: The chimera uses its Claw attack.

fields.name: Headbutt
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or fall prone.

fields.name: Tail Swipe
fields.desc: If a creature within 5 feet hits the chimera with a melee attack, the attacker is battered by the chimeras tail. The attacker makes a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, it takes 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage and is pushed 10 feet from the chimera and knocked prone.

fields.name: The chimera can take 2 legendary actions
fields.desc: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. It regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

fields.name: Winged Charge
fields.desc: If a creature the chimera can see hits it with a ranged attack, the chimera leaps off the ground and moves up to its fly speed towards the attacker. If within range, the chimera then makes a headbutt attack against the attacker.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: If the chuul is grappling a creature  it uses its tentacle on that creature. It then makes two pincer attacks.

fields.name: Pincer
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature  it is grappled (escape DC 15). When carrying a grappled creature  the chuul can move at full speed. A pincer that is being used to grapple a creature can be used only to attack that creature.

fields.name: Tentacle
fields.desc: A grappled creature makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  it is paralyzed for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the paralysis on a success.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The guardian attacks twice with its slam.

fields.name: Slam
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature  it makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage dealt. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. A greater restoration spell or similar magic removes the reduction.

fields.name: Angry Moan
fields.desc: When the cloaker takes damage, it uses Moan.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). If the cloaker has advantage against the target  the cloaker attaches to the targets head  and the target is blinded and suffocating. Until this grapple ends  the cloaker automatically hits the grappled creature with this attack. When the cloaker is dealt damage while grappling  it takes half the damage (rounded down) and the other half is dealt to the grappled target. The cloaker can have only one creature grappled at once.

fields.name: Moan
fields.desc: Each non-aberration creature within 60 feet that can hear its moan makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure  it is frightened until the end of the cloakers next turn. When a creature succeeds on this saving throw  it becomes immune to the cloakers moan for 24 hours.

fields.name: Phantasms
fields.desc: The cloaker magically creates flickering illusions of itself in its space. Attacks on it have disadvantage. This effect ends after 1 minute  when the cloaker enters an area of bright light  or when it successfully grapples a creature.

fields.name: Reactive Tail
fields.desc: When hit or missed with a melee attack, the cloaker makes a tail attack against the attacker.

fields.name: Tail
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage  and the creature makes a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  it is poisoned until the end of the cloakers next turn.

fields.name: Calculated Sweep
fields.desc: The sentinel makes a melee attack against each creature of its choice within 10 feet. On a critical hit  the target makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

fields.name: Halberd
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The sentinel attacks three times.

fields.name: Overclock
fields.desc: The sentinel takes the Dash action.

fields.name: Parry
fields.desc: The sentinel adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it.

fields.name: Arc Lightning
fields.desc: Up to three creatures within 60 feet that the giant can see make DC 15 Dexterity saving throws  taking 42 (12d6) lightning damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

fields.name: Blinking Blades
fields.desc: The giant magically teleports multiple times within a few seconds. The giant may make one glaive attack against each creature of its choice within 30 feet  up to a maximum of 6 attacks.

fields.name: Fog Cloud
fields.desc: (1st-Level; V, S, Concentration) The giant creates a 20-foot-radius  heavily obscured sphere of fog centered on a point it can see within 120 feet. The fog spreads around corners and can be dispersed by a moderate wind (at least 10 miles per hour). It lasts for 1 hour.

fields.name: Glaive
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature  it makes a DC 20 Strength saving throw. On a failure  it is pushed up to 10 feet away from the giant and knocked prone.

fields.name: Gust
fields.desc: One creature within 10 feet makes a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed up to 30 feet away from the giant.

fields.name: Misty Step
fields.desc: (2nd-Level; V) The giant teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet. The giant can't cast this spell and a 1st-level or higher spell on the same turn.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The giant attacks twice with its glaive.

fields.name: Reverse Gravity
fields.desc: Each creature of the giants choice within 30 feet is magically hurled 60 feet in the air. If a creature hits an obstacle  it takes 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage. The creatures then fall  taking falling damage as normal.

fields.name: Rock
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 39 (9d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature  it makes a DC 20 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

fields.name: Silver Tongue
fields.desc: One creature that can hear the giant within 30 feet makes a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure  it is magically charmed by the giant for 1 hour. This effect ends if the giant or its allies harm the creature.

fields.name: Fog Cloud
fields.desc: (1st-Level; V, S, Concentration) The giant creates a 20-foot-radius  heavily obscured sphere of fog centered on a point it can see within 120 feet. The fog spreads around corners and can be dispersed by a moderate wind (at least 10 miles per hour). It lasts for 1 hour.

fields.name: Glaive
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature  it makes a DC 20 Strength saving throw. On a failure  it is pushed up to 10 feet away from the giant and knocked prone.

fields.name: Gust
fields.desc: One creature within 10 feet makes a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is pushed up to 30 feet away from the giant.

fields.name: Misty Step
fields.desc: (2nd-Level; V) The giant teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet. The giant can't cast this spell and a 1st-level or higher spell on the same turn.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The giant attacks twice with its glaive.

fields.name: Rock
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 39 (9d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature  it makes a DC 20 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage  and the target makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw against being petrified. On a failure  the target is restrained as it begins to turn to stone. A lesser restoration spell ends this effect. If still restrained  the creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success  the effect ends. On a failure  the creature is petrified for 24 hours.

fields.name: Frenzy
fields.desc: When attacked by a creature it can see within 20 feet, the cockatrice moves up to half its Speed and makes a bite attack against that creature.

fields.name: Clubs
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., up to two targets. Hit: 10 (4d4) bludgeoning damage  or half damage if the mob is bloodied.

fields.name: Stones
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 10/30 ft., up to two targets. Hit: 10 (4d4) bludgeoning damage or half damage if the mob is bloodied.

fields.name: Club
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Stone
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 10/30 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

fields.name: Constrict
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends  the target is restrained and the snake can't constrict a different target.

fields.name: Acid Breath
fields.desc: The dragon exhales acid in a 20-foot-long  5-foot wide-line. Each creature in the area makes a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw  taking 13 (3d8) acid damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

fields.name: Breath Weapons
fields.desc: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons:

fields.name: Slowing Breath
fields.desc: The dragon exhales toxic gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw  becoming slowed for 1 minute on a failure. A creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on itself on a success.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage  and the target makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw against being petrified. On a failure  the target is restrained as it begins to turn to a brightly colored statue. A lesser restoration spell ends this effect. If still restrained  the creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success  the effect ends. On a failure  the creature is petrified for 24 hours.

fields.name: Frenzy
fields.desc: When attacked by a creature it can see within 20 feet, the cockatrice moves up to half its Speed and makes a bite attack against that creature.

fields.name: Darkness Aura
fields.desc: A 15-foot radius area of magical darkness emanates from the unicorn  spreading around corners and moving with it. Darkvision and natural light can't penetrate it. If the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a 2nd-level spell or lower  the spell creating the light is dispelled. The darkness aura lasts for 10 minutes or until the unicorn takes damage. The aura doesnt hinder the unicorns sight.

fields.name: Grant Boon
fields.desc: The unicorn touches a willing creature including itself  with its horn and grants one of the following boons:

fields.name: Healing
fields.desc: The creature magically regains 21 (6d6) hit points. It is cured of all diseases and poisons affecting it are neutralized.

fields.name: Hooves
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Horn
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) radiant damage. If the target is a creature and the unicorn moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack  the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and makes a DC 16 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

fields.name: Luck: During the next 24 hours, the creature can roll a d12 and add the result to one ability check, attack roll, or saving throw after seeing the result
Multiattack
fields.desc: The unicorn attacks once with its hooves and once with its horn.

fields.name: Protection: A glowing mote of light orbits the creatures head
fields.desc: The mote lasts 24 hours. When the creature fails a saving throw  it can use its reaction to expend the mote and succeed on the saving throw.

fields.name: Resolution
fields.desc: The creature is immune to being charmed or frightened for 24 hours.

fields.name: Trample
fields.desc: The unicorn attacks a prone creature with its hooves.

fields.name: Alter Bomb
fields.desc: The alchemist quickly swaps reagents to change the damage dealt by their next bomb to acid, cold, lightning, poison, or thunder.

fields.name: Bomb
fields.desc: The alchemist lobs a bomb at a point they can see within 80 feet. Upon impact the bomb explodes in a 10-foot radius. Creatures in the area make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw taking 24 (7d6) fire damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

fields.name: Dagger
fields.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

fields.name: Desperate Drink
fields.desc: When the alchemist is dealt damage, they drink a potion.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The alchemist attacks twice with their dagger.

fields.name: Potion
fields.desc: The alchemist drinks or administers a potion.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage  and the target makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  it is poisoned for 24 hours. The target is unconscious until the poisoned condition ends or a creature uses an action to shake the target awake.

fields.name: Constrict
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends  the target is restrained  the couatl can't constrict other targets  and the couatl has advantage on attacks against the target.

fields.name: Heal
fields.desc: The couatl touches a creature  magically healing 20 hit points of damage and ending the poisoned condition on that creature.

fields.name: Shapeshift
fields.desc: The couatl magically changes its form to resemble that of a humanoid or beast  or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. If its form is humanoid  it is equipped with clothing and a weapon. While shapeshifted  its statistics are the same except that it can't use Constrict and Shielding Wing and it may gain a swim speed of 60 or lose its fly speed if appropriate to its new form. If its a beast  it can use its bite attack. If its a humanoid  it may make a weapon attack  which functions identically to its bite attack.

fields.name: Shielding Wing
fields.desc: When the couatl or a creature within 5 feet is attacked, the couatl can interpose a wing and impose disadvantage on the attack.
Charm Hex. The target is charmed by the hag.
Fear Hex. The target is frightened of the hag.
Ill Fortune Hex. The hag magically divines the targets activities. Whenever the target attempts a long-duration task such as a craft or downtime activity  the hag can cause the activity to fail.
Sleep Hex. The target falls unconscious. The curse ends early if the target takes damage or if a creature uses an action to shake it awake.

fields.name: Beast Form
fields.desc: The hag magically transforms into a Large or smaller beast or back into its true form. While in beast form  it retains its game statistics can't cast spells can't use Hex  and can't speak. The hags Speed increases by 10 feet  and when appropriate to its beast form it gains a climb  fly  or swim speed of 40 feet. Any equipment the hag is wearing or wielding merges into its new form.

fields.name: Claws
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage.

fields.name: Hex (Gaze)
fields.desc: A creature within 60 feet that is not already under a hags hex makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. A creature under an obligation to the hag automatically fails this saving throw. On a failed saving throw  the target is cursed with a magical hex that lasts 30 days. The curse ends early if the target suffers harm from the hag or if the hag ends it as an action. Roll 1d4:

fields.name: Invisibility
fields.desc: (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration) The hag is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the hag attacks  uses Hex  or casts a spell.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The hag attacks twice with its claws and then uses Hex if not in beast form.

fields.name: Claws
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage  and the target is subject to the hags Curse trait.

fields.name: Fragmentary Dream
fields.desc: The hag creates a terrifying illusion visible only to one creature that it can see within 120 feet. The creature makes a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. It takes 22 (4d10) psychic damage and becomes frightened until the end of its turn on a failure, or takes half damage on a success.

fields.name: Nightmare Haunting
fields.desc: While on the Ethereal Plane  the hag magically touches a sleeping creature that is under the night hags Curse and is not protected by a magic circle or protection from evil and good spell or similar magic. As long as the touch persists  the target has terrible nightmares. If the nightmares last for 1 hour  the target gains no benefit from the rest  and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 (1d10) until the curse ends. If this effect reduces the targets hit points maximum to 0  the target dies and the hag captures its soul. The reduction to the targets hit point maximum lasts until removed by greater restoration or similar magic.

fields.name: Planar Travel
fields.desc: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane  or vice versa. Alternatively  the hag is magically transported to the Material Plane  Hell  or the Abyss  arriving within 10 miles of its desired destination.

fields.name: Shapeshift
fields.desc: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid. Equipment it is carrying isnt transformed. It retains its claws in any form. It has no true form and remains in its current form when it dies.

fields.name: Sleep Touch
fields.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: The target falls asleep for 4 hours or until it takes damage or is shaken awake. Once the hag successfully hits a target  it can't make this attack again until it finishes a long rest.

fields.name: Steal Magic
fields.desc: When a creature the hag can see within 60 feet casts a spell using a 3rd-level or lower spell slot, the hag attempts to steal its power. The caster makes a DC 14 saving throw using its spellcasting ability. On a failure, the spell fails, and the hag gains 5 (1d10) temporary hit points per level of the spell slot used.

fields.name: Claws
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

fields.name: Death Glare (Gaze)
fields.desc: One frightened creature within 30 feet makes a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw  the creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success  the creature takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage.

fields.name: Horrific Transformation
fields.desc: The hag briefly takes on a terrifying form or reveals its true form. Each creature within 30 feet that can see the hag makes a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. A creature under the hags curse automatically fails this saving throw. On a failure, the creature is frightened until the end of its next turn. If a creatures saving throw is successful, it is immune to the hags Horrific Transformation for 24 hours.

fields.name: Lightning Blast
fields.desc: An 80-foot-long  5-foot-wide lightning bolt springs from the hags extended claw. Each creature in the area makes a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw  taking 21 (6d6) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The hag attacks twice with its claws.

fields.name: Claws
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) slashing damage.

fields.name: Cone of Cold
fields.desc: (5th-Level; V, S) Frost blasts from the hag in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in the area makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw  taking 36 (8d8) cold damage on a failure or half damage on a success.

fields.name: Ice Bolt
fields.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) cold damage  and the target makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. A creature under the hags curse automatically fails this saving throw. On a failure  the creature is restrained as it begins to turn to ice. At the end of the creatures next turn  the creature repeats the saving throw. On a success  the effect ends. On a failure  the creature is petrified into ice. This petrification can be removed with greater restoration or similar magic.

fields.name: Ice Shield
fields.desc: The hag adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it made by a creature it can see. If the attack misses, the attacker takes 14 (4d6) cold damage.

fields.name: If the wall enters a creatures space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (hags choice)
fields.desc: The creature then makes a Dexterity saving throw  taking 35 (10d6) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

fields.name: Invisibility
fields.desc: (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration) The hag is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the hag attacks or casts a spell.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The hag attacks with its claws and uses Ice Bolt.

fields.name: Shapeshift
fields.desc: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Equipment it is carrying isnt transformed. It retains a streak of white hair in any form. It returns to its true form if it dies.

fields.name: Wall of Ice
fields.desc: (6th-level; V, S, Concentration) The hag magically creates a wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 120 feet. The wall is flat  1 foot thick  and can be up to 50 feet long and 20 feet high. The wall lasts for 10 minutes. Each 10-foot section has AC 12  30 hit points  vulnerability to fire damage  and immunity to cold  poison  and psychic damage. Destroying a 10-foot section of wall leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the section occupied. A creature moving through the sheet of frigid air for the first time on a turn makes a Constitution saving throw  taking 17 (5d6) cold damage on a failed save or half damage on a success.

fields.name: Claws
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage. If this damage would reduce a Small or larger target to 0 hit points  the target takes no damage from this attack.

fields.name: Command Bodyguard
fields.desc: When the boss would be hit by an attack, they command an ally within 5 feet to use its reaction to switch places with the boss. The ally is hit by the attack instead of the boss.

fields.name: Dagger
fields.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

fields.name: Mark for Death
fields.desc: The boss targets a creature within 30 feet that can see or hear them. For 1 minute or until the boss threatens a different target  the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage whenever the boss hits it with a weapon attack.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The boss attacks three times with their shortsword.

fields.name: Offhand Dagger
fields.desc: When missed by an attack, the boss makes a dagger attack.

fields.name: Shortsword
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10+2) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends  the target is restrained and the crocodile can't bite a different target.

fields.name: Crush
fields.desc: The crusher moves up to its Speed in a straight line. While doing so  it can attempt to enter Large or smaller creatures spaces. Whenever the crusher attempts to enter a creatures space  the creature makes a DC 17 Dexterity or Strength saving throw (the creatures choice). If the creature succeeds at a Strength saving throw  the crushers movement ends for the turn. If the creature succeeds at a Dexterity saving throw  the creature may use its reaction  if available  to move up to half its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks. The first time on the crushers turn that it enters a creatures space  the creature is knocked prone and takes 50 (10d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. A creature is prone while in the crushers space.

fields.name: Overclock
fields.desc: The crusher takes the Dash action.

fields.name: Ram
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage. If the crusher moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack  the attack deals an extra 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Blindness/Deafness
fields.desc: (2nd-Level; V) One creature the cult fanatic can see within 30 feet makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  the creature is blinded or deafened (cult fanatics choice) for 1 minute. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on a success.

fields.name: Command
fields.desc: (1st-Level; V) One non-undead creature the cult fanatic can see within 60 feet that can hear and understand them makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure  the target uses its next turn to grovel (falling prone and then ending its turn).

fields.name: Dagger
fields.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

fields.name: Hold Person
fields.desc: (2nd-Level; V, S, M, Concentration) One humanoid the cult fanatic can see within 60 feet makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure  the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on a success.

fields.name: Inflict Wounds
fields.desc: (1st-Level; V, S) Melee Spell Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 16 (3d10) necrotic damage.

fields.name: Sacred Flame
fields.desc: (Cantrip; V, S) One creature the cult fanatic can see within 60 feet makes a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw  taking 4 (1d8) radiant damage on a failure. This spell ignores cover.

fields.name: Cultists worship forbidden gods, devils, demons, and other sinister beings
fields.desc: Many cultists work to summon the object of their devotion to the world so it might grant them power and destroy their enemies.

fields.name: Dagger
fields.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

fields.name: Cunning Action
fields.desc: The cutthroat takes the Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action.

fields.name: Hand Crossbow
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

fields.name: Rapid Attack
fields.desc: The cutthroat attacks with their shortsword.

fields.name: Shortsword
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

fields.name: Big Windup
fields.desc: When a creature hits the cyclops with a melee attack, the cyclops readies a powerful strike against its attacker. The cyclops has advantage on the next club attack it makes against the attacker before the end of its next turn.

fields.name: Maul
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (6d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The cyclops makes two melee attacks.

fields.name: Rock
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 120 ft. (see Poor Depth Perception)  one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Thick Skulled
fields.desc: The cyclops can end one condition on itself that was imposed through a failed Wisdom saving throw.

fields.name: Big Windup
fields.desc: When a creature hits the cyclops with a melee attack, the cyclops readies a powerful strike against its attacker. The cyclops has advantage on the next club attack it makes against the attacker before the end of its next turn.

fields.name: Club
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The cyclops makes two melee attacks.

fields.name: Rock
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 120 ft. (see Poor Depth Perception)  one target. Hit: 32 (5d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Thick Skulled
fields.desc: The cyclops can end one condition on itself that was imposed through a failed Wisdom saving throw.

fields.name: Crush
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). If the darkmantle made the attack with advantage  it attaches to the targets head  and the target is blinded and can't breathe. While grappling  the darkmantle can only attack the grappled creature but has advantage on its attack roll. The darkmantles speed becomes 0  and it moves with its target.

fields.name: Darkness Aura
fields.desc: A 15-foot radius area of magical darkness emanates from the darkmantle  spreading around corners and moving with it. Darkvision and natural light can't penetrate it. If the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a 2nd-level spell or lower  the spell creating the light is dispelled. The darkness aura lasts for 10 minutes or until the darkmantle takes damage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The darkmantle uses Darkness Aura and makes a crush attack.

fields.name: Ethereal Spores
fields.desc: Each creature within 30 feet makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw  taking 31 (9d6) necrotic damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies. If a creature killed by this attack remains on the Ethereal Plane for 24 hours  its corpse disintegrates  and a new dead mans fingers sprouts from its place.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The dead mans fingers makes two tendril attacks.

fields.name: Telekinetic Pull
fields.desc: One creature within 90 feet makes a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure, it is magically pulled up to 60 feet straight towards the dead mans fingers.

fields.name: Tendril (Ethereal or Material Plane)
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage. A target on the Material Plane is subject to the Ethereal Shift trait.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature  it makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  it becomes infected with a disease. Until this disease is cured  the target is poisoned. While diseased  the target makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw every 24 hours  reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure and ending the disease on a success. This hit point maximum reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The death dog attacks twice with its bite.

fields.name: Enlarge
fields.desc: (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration) The soldier and their equipment grow to Large size for 1 minute. They have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws  and their attacks deal an extra 2 (1d4) damage (included in their War Pick attack).

fields.name: Heavy Crossbow
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

fields.name: Invisibility
fields.desc: (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration) The soldier is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the soldier attacks or casts a spell.

fields.name: Tactical Movement
fields.desc: Until the end of the soldiers turn, their Speed is halved and their movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks.

fields.name: War Pick
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage  or 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage if within 5 feet of an ally that is not incapacitated  plus 2 (1d4) damage when Enlarged.

fields.name: Blindness
fields.desc: (2nd-Level; V) A creature within 30 feet makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  the target is blinded for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on a success.

fields.name: War Pick
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

fields.name: Headbutt
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

fields.name: A demilich mastermind begins combat with up to four empty soul gems
Cranial Transposition
fields.desc: The dust surrounding the demilich falls to the ground. The demilich and a nonmagical, unattended skull within 30 teleport, switching places. Until the demilich moves or attacks, it is indistinguishable from a nonmagical skull, and the dust composing the demilichs wraithlike body doesnt reform around it.

fields.name: Devour Soul
fields.desc: The demilich targets one creature within 120 feet  forcing it to make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a success  or if all the large soul gems on the demilichs skull are occupied  the creature takes 40 necrotic damage  and the demilich regains the same number of hit points. If the target fails its saving throw and there is at least one unoccupied soul gem on the demilichs skull  the demilich regains 40 hit points  and the target dies instantly. Its soul is trapped in a soul gem on the demilichs skull  visible as a tiny  creature-shaped mote of light. While its soul is trapped  a creature can't be restored to life by any means. A soul that remains in a soul gem for 30 days is destroyed forever. If the demilich is defeated and a soul gem crushed  the creature is restored to life if its body is within 100 miles. A creature that succeeds on a saving throw against this effect is immune to it for 24 hours.

fields.name: Dust Storm
fields.desc: The dust of the demilichs body swirls in a 30-foot radius around the demilich. Each creature in the area makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 21 (6d6) necrotic damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn. The demilich then moves up to its speed.

fields.name: Ringing Laugh
fields.desc: Each creature within 60 feet that can hear the demilich makes a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature is frightened until the end of its next turn.

fields.name: Telekinesis
fields.desc: The demilich targets a Huge or smaller creature or an object weighing up to 1,000 pounds within 60 feet. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw. Otherwise, the demilich moves the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including up. If another creature or object stops the targets movement, both take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage. At the end of this movement, the target falls if it is still in the air, taking falling damage as normal.

fields.name: The demilich can take 3 legendary actions
fields.desc: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. The demilich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

fields.name: A demilich begins combat with one or two empty soul gems
Cranial Transposition
fields.desc: The dust surrounding the demilich falls to the ground. The demilich and a nonmagical, unattended skull within 30 teleport, switching places. Until the demilich moves or attacks, it is indistinguishable from a nonmagical skull, and the dust composing the demilichs wraithlike body doesnt reform around it.

fields.name: Devour Soul

On a success  or if all the large soul gems on the demilichs skull are occupied  the creature takes 40 necrotic damage  and the demilich regains the same number of hit points. If the target fails its saving throw and there is at least one unoccupied soul gem on the demilichs skull  the demilich regains 40 hit points  and the target dies instantly. Its soul is trapped in a soul gem on the demilichs skull  visible as a tiny  creature-shaped mote of light. While its soul is trapped  a creature can't be restored to life by any means. A soul that remains in a soul gem for 30 days is destroyed forever. If the demilich is defeated and a soul gem crushed  the creature is restored to life if its body is within 100 miles. A creature that succeeds on a saving throw against this effect is immune to it for 24 hours.

fields.name: Dust Storm
fields.desc: The dust of the demilichs body swirls in a 30-foot radius around the demilich. Each creature in the area makes a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 21 (6d6) necrotic damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn. The demilich then moves up to its speed.

fields.name: Ringing Laugh
fields.desc: Each creature within 60 feet that can hear the demilich makes a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature is frightened until the end of its next turn.

fields.name: Telekinesis
fields.desc: The demilich targets a Huge or smaller creature or an object weighing up to 1,000 pounds within 60 feet. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw. Otherwise, the demilich moves the target up to 30 feet in any direction, including up. If another creature or object stops the targets movement, both take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage. At the end of this movement, the target falls if it is still in the air, taking falling damage as normal.

fields.name: The demilich can take 3 legendary actions
fields.desc: Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatures turn. The demilich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

fields.name: Celestial Hammer
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 17 (5d6) radiant damage. On a hit  the target can't make opportunity attacks against the deva until the beginning of the targets next turn.

fields.name: Change Form
fields.desc: The deva magically transforms into a beast or humanoid or back into its true form. It retains its deva statistics  including speech and telepathy  except that it has the size  movement modes  and traits of its new form.

fields.name: Divine Blast
fields.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (5d8) radiant damage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The deva makes two attacks.

fields.name: Radiant Energy
fields.desc: The deva touches a creature other than itself. If the target is unwilling  the deva makes an attack roll with a +8 bonus. The deva can choose to magically heal 60 hit points of damage and end any blindness  curse  deafness  disease  or poison on the target. Alternatively  the deva can choose to deal 60 radiant damage to the target.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The diplodocus makes a stomp attack and a tail attack against two different targets.

fields.name: Stomp
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (4d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Tail
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature  it is pushed 10 feet away from the diplodocus and knocked prone.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage and the target makes a DC 11 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  the target takes 10 (3d6) poison damage and is poisoned for 1 minute. The target is paralyzed while poisoned in this way. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on a success.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a creature  it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends  the tyrannosaurus can't bite a different creature and it has advantage on bite attacks against the grappled creature.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The tyrannosaurus makes a bite attack and a tail attack against two different targets.

fields.name: Tail
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4+3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature  it makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4+2) piercing damage. Giant rats who dwell in sewers and filth can carry debilitating disease. A creature bitten by a diseased giant rat makes a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or it becomes infected with sewer plague.

fields.name: Crushing Hand
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends  the divi can't use Crushing Hand on another target and has advantage on Crushing Hand attacks against this target  and the target can't breathe.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The divi makes two melee attacks.

fields.name: Quake
fields.desc: Amid deafening rumbling  the ground shakes in a 10-foot radius around a point on an earth or stone surface within 90 feet. The area becomes difficult terrain. Each non-elemental creature in the area makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw  taking 24 (7d6) thunder damage and falling prone on a failure or taking half damage on a success.

fields.name: Stone Club
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Stone Wall
fields.desc: A permanent stone wall magically rises from an earth or stone surface within 60 feet. The wall is 6 inches thick and can be up to 20 feet high and 30 feet long. If it appears in a creatures space, the creature can choose which side of the wall to move to. Each 10-foot-by-10-foot section of the wall is an object with AC 18 and 30 hit points.

fields.name: Crushing Hand
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends  the divi can't use Crushing Hand on another target and has advantage on Crushing Hand attacks against this target  and the target can't breathe.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The divi makes two melee attacks.

fields.name: Quake
