If the target is reduced to 0 hit points by this attack  it dies.

fields.name: Grab
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The target is grappled (escape DC 14).

fields.name: Hissing Scuttle
fields.desc: When the vampire takes radiant damage, it moves up to its Speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The vampire makes two attacks  only one of which can be a bite attack.

fields.name: Ethereal Jaunt
fields.desc: The ghost magically shifts from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice versa. If it wishes  it can be visible to creatures on one plane while on the other.

fields.name: Horrifying Visage
fields.desc: If the ghost takes damage from an attack or spell, it uses Horrifying Visage.

fields.name: Possession
fields.desc: One humanoid within 5 feet makes a DC 13 Charisma saving throw. On a failure  it is possessed by the ghost. The possessed creature is unconscious. The ghost enters the creatures body and takes control of it. The ghost can be targeted only by effects that turn undead  and it retains its Intelligence  Wisdom  and Charisma. It grants its host body immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed creatures statistics and actions instead of its own. It doesnt gain access to the creatures memories but does gain access to proficiencies  nonmagical class features and traits  and nonmagical actions. It can't use limited-used abilities or class traits that require spending a resource. The possession ends after 24 hours  when the body drops to 0 hit points  when the ghost ends it as a bonus action  or when the ghost is turned or affected by dispel evil and good or a similar effect. Additionally  the possessed creature repeats its saving throw whenever it takes damage. When the possession ends  the ghost reappears in a space within 5 feet of the body. A creature is immune to this ghosts Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on its saving throw or after the possession ends.

fields.name: Withering Touch
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage. If the target is frightened  it is magically aged 1d4 x 10 years. The aging effect can be reversed with a greater restoration spell.

fields.name: Heavy Crossbow
fields.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

fields.name: Longsword
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The veteran makes two melee attacks.

fields.name: Off-Hand Counter
fields.desc: When the veteran is missed by a melee attack by an attacker they can see within 5 feet, the veteran makes a shortsword attack against the attacker.

fields.name: Shortsword
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

fields.name: Tactical Movement
fields.desc: Until the end of the veterans turn, their Speed is halved and their movement doesnt provoke opportunity attacks.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The fungus makes a rotting touch attack against two different creatures.

fields.name: Rotting Touch
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) necrotic damage.

fields.name: Beak
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the vrock has advantage on the attack roll  it deals an additional 7 (2d6) damage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The vrock attacks with its beak and its talons.

fields.name: Spores
fields.desc: A 15-foot-radius cloud of spores emanates from the vrock  spreading around corners. Each creature in the area makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw  becoming poisoned for 1 minute on a failure. While poisoned in this way  the target takes ongoing 5 (1d10) poison damage. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on itself on a success.

fields.name: Stunning Screech
fields.desc: The vrock screeches. Each non-demon creature within 20 feet that can hear it makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, it is stunned until the end of the vrocks next turn.

fields.name: Talons
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage.

fields.name: Beak
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

fields.name: Retreat
fields.desc: When the vulture would be hit by a melee attack, the vulture can move 5 feet away from the attacker. If this moves the vulture out of the attackers reach, the attacker has disadvantage on its attack.

fields.name: Smash
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Beak
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature grappled by the grick. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

fields.name: Tentacles
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage  and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends  the grick can't attack a different target with its tentacles.

fields.name: Dispel Magic
fields.desc: (3rd-Level; V, S) The priest scours the magic from one creature  object  or magical effect within 120 feet that they can see. A spell ends if it was cast with a 3rd-level or lower spell slot. For spells using a 4th-level or higher spell slot  the priest makes a Wisdom ability check (DC 10 + the spells level) for each one  ending the effect on a success.

fields.name: Guiding Bolt
fields.desc: (1st-Level; V, S) Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) radiant damage  and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of the priests next turn has advantage.

fields.name: Healing Word
fields.desc: (1st-Level; V) The priest or a living creature within 60 feet regains 5 (1d4 + 3) hit points. The priest can't cast this spell and a 1st-level or higher spell on the same turn.

fields.name: Mace
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage. On a hit  the priest can expend a spell slot to deal 7 (2d6) radiant damage  plus an extra 3 (1d6) radiant damage for each level of the spell slot expended above 1st.

fields.name: Sacred Flame
fields.desc: (Cantrip; V, S) One creature the priest can see within 60 feet makes a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw  taking 9 (2d8) radiant damage on a failure. This spell ignores cover.

fields.name: Spirit Guardians
fields.desc: (3rd-Level; V, S, M, Concentration) Spectral forms surround the priest in a 10-foot radius for 10 minutes. The priest can choose creatures they can see to be unaffected by the spell. Other creatures treat the area as difficult terrain  and when a creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there  it makes a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw  taking 10 (3d6) radiant or necrotic damage (priests choice) on a failure or half damage on a success.

fields.name: Aggressive Charge
fields.desc: The war chief moves up to their Speed towards an enemy they can see or hear.

fields.name: Greataxe
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage. If the warrior has moved this turn  this attack is made with advantage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The warrior attacks twice.

fields.name: Whirling Axe
fields.desc: The war chief attacks with their greataxe.

fields.name: Aggressive Charge
fields.desc: The warrior moves up to their Speed towards an enemy they can see or hear.

fields.name: Greataxe
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d12 + 1) slashing damage.

fields.name: Hooves
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) bludgeoning damage. If the horse moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack  the target makes a DC 14 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

fields.name: Baleful Wail
fields.desc: The banshee shrieks. All living creatures within 30 feet of it that can hear it make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  a creature takes 11 (2d6 + 4) psychic damage. If the creature is cursed by the banshee  it drops to 0 hit points instead.

fields.name: Presage Death
fields.desc: The banshee targets a creature within 60 feet that can hear it  predicting its doom. The target makes a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure  the target takes 11 (2d6 + 4) psychic damage and is magically cursed for 1 hour. While cursed in this way  the target has disadvantage on saving throws against the banshees Baleful Wail.

fields.name: Wounded Warning
fields.desc: When the banshee takes damage from a creature within 60 feet, it uses Presage Death on the attacker.

fields.name: Spears
fields.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 22 (5d6 + 5) piercing damage  or half damage when bloodied.

fields.name: Spear
fields.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

fields.name: Slam
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

fields.name: Whelm
fields.desc: The elemental targets each Large or smaller creature in its space. Each target makes a DC 15 Strength saving throw. On a failure  the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends  the target is restrained and unable to breathe air. The elemental can move at full speed while carrying grappled creatures inside its space. It can grapple one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage. If this damage would reduce a Small or larger target to 0 hit points  the target takes no damage from this attack.

fields.name: Bite
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid  it makes a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  it is cursed with werebear lycanthropy.

fields.name: Claw
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature  it is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends  the werebear can't use its greataxe and can't attack a different target with its claw.

fields.name: Frenzied Bite
fields.desc: The werebear makes a bite attack.

fields.name: Greataxe
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

fields.name: Handaxe
fields.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

fields.name: Multiattack
fields.desc: The werebear makes two claw attacks  two greataxe attacks  or two handaxe attacks.

fields.name: Shapeshift
fields.desc: The werebear changes its form to a Large bear, a Large bear-humanoid hybrid, or into its true form, which is a humanoid. While shapeshifted, its statistics are unchanged except for its size. It can't speak in bear form. Its equipment is not transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

fields.name: Frenzied Tusks

A humanoid or beast reduced to 0 hit points by this attack dies. Its corpse rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the wights control.

fields.name: Illumination
fields.desc: The will-o-wisp alters the radius of its glow (shedding bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for the same number of feet beyond that radius), changes the color of its glow, or extinguishes its glow (making it invisible).

fields.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +7 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) cold damage  and the target makes a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. A creature under the hags curse automatically fails this saving throw. On a failure  the creature is restrained as it begins to turn to ice. At the end of the creatures next turn  the creature repeats the saving throw. On a success  the effect ends. On a failure  the creature is petrified into ice. This petrification can be removed with greater restoration or similar magic.

fields.name: Ice Shield
fields.desc: The hag adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it made by a creature it can see. If the attack misses, the attacker takes 14 (4d6) cold damage.

fields.name: Invisibility
fields.desc: (2nd-Level; V, S, Concentration) The hag is invisible for 1 hour. The spell ends if the hag attacks or casts a spell.

fields.name: Multiattack

fields.name: Shapeshift
fields.desc: The hag magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Equipment it is carrying isnt transformed. It retains a streak of white hair in any form. It returns to its true form if it dies.

fields.name: Bite

fields.name: Corporeal Form
fields.desc: The wraith lord takes on a material form. In material form  it loses its incorporeal trait  its fly speed  and its immunity to the grappled  prone  and restrained conditions. The wraith instantly reverts to its incorporeal form if it is bloodied  and it can do so voluntarily at any time as an action.

fields.name: Create Wraith
fields.desc: The wraith lord touches a humanoid corpse it killed up to 1 day ago. The creatures spirit rises as a wraith under the wraith lords control.

fields.name: Greatsword
fields.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 17 (5d6) poison damage  and the target makes a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  the target is poisoned for 24 hours. While poisoned in this way  the target can't regain hit points. If a creature dies while poisoned in this way  its spirit rises as a wraith under the wraith lords control 1 minute after its death.

fields.name: Life Drain
fields.desc: The wraith targets a creature within 5 feet  forcing it to make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  the creature takes 17 (5d6) necrotic damage  or 24 (7d6) necrotic damage if it is frightened or surprised  and its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. It dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

fields.name: Paralyzing Terror
fields.desc: The wraith lord targets a frightened creature within 60 feet  forcing it to make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure  the target is paralyzed for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on itself on a success.

fields.name: Create Specter
fields.desc: The wraith touches a humanoid corpse it killed less than 1 day ago. The creatures spirit rises as a specter under the wraiths control.

This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. It dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.
